channel.title: Image Effects :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: Th' theme supports non-standard image effects. Name Descript'n border Draws a light thin border around th' image lazy Lets th' image be lazy boarded lightbox Th' image will be click'ble t' show it enlarged shadow Draws a shadow around th' image t' make it appear hovered/glow'n As described, ye can add this t' th' URL query parameter, but this may be cumbersome t' be done consistently fer th' whole plank.
